== Introduction ==
Seamonkey is a all-in-one internet application suite that is a continuation of The Mozilla Foundation's Application Suite. The Foundation decided to focus on their stand-alone projects Firefox and Thunderbird. However, they offered the infrastructure to allow a community to continue with the development thus beginning the <nowiki>[[http://www.seamonkeyproject.org|Seamonkey Project]]</nowiki>

As of right now Seamonkey is not included as a package in Ubuntu. Download it from the <nowiki>[[http://www.seamonkey-project.org/|Seamonkey homepage]]</nowiki> or add the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuzilla.sourceforge.net|Ubuntuzilla repository]]</nowiki> if you want to run it.
